attributes.action: Abolish the 12 month continous employment rule
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When you come to the end of your contractual trial period you may think you have all the rights granted to you in your contract and that an employer would actually have to have a justified reason for terminating your contract. 

Actually, this is not the case as under current legislation you can be fired for any reason at all without any justification and outside of any company disciplinary procedures of which are actually pointless until after the first year.

It is a disgrace that current legislation allows this immoral practice and heading into a recession where companies will be looking for ways to lay off existing staff it is vital that the government considers all possible ways of protecting people presently in employment.
